title: Properties of matter. Part 4. Plastics and rubbers
brief_description: Sir Lawrence Bragg compares naturally and artificially produced plastics, describes their structure, illustrates how simple molecules by chemical reaction are transformed into macro-molecules, shows the manufacture of a plastic, and describes and illustrates the constitution of rubber. Suitable for secondary level.
